original_text:
While he was still talking to them, the messenger came down to him.
The king said, “This disaster is from the Lord. Why should I wait for the Lord any longer?”
korean_text: 무리와 말을 할 때에 그 사자가 그에게 이르니라 왕이 이르되 이 재앙이 여호와께로부터 나왔으니 어찌 더 여호와를 기다리리요

sentences.original_text: While he was still talking to them
the messenger came down to him
This disaster is from the Lord
Why should I wait for the Lord any longer
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 더 이상 주님을 기다려야 하는 이유가 무엇인가
